context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"1ea59c","name":"Video element audio described","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all visual information also contained in the audio.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}

pageContext.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"1ea59c","name":"Video element audio described","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that non-streaming `video` elements have all visual information also contained in the audio.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling","Audio output","Visual output"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
